comments.body: In this example, what do we use the empty-dir volume for?

This is just a 'clean' volume (http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/volumes/#emptydir).
As per our email thread, I'm not sure why Brendan specifically did it this way, but we should investigate whether syncing problems are introduced if a cassandra node (a pod) is using a PD, goes down, comes back up, and needs to resync.
